who_we_are.title: The Trusted Bridge to China's Industrial Core
who_we_are.description: In an era where AI generates endless content, the value of manual, on-the-ground verification is more precious than ever. We exist to cut through the noise. We are not just a directory; we are a technical verification platform dedicated to unearthing the 'Hidden Champions' of the heat exchanger industry—companies that possess world-class engineering capabilities but lack the global visibility they deserve.

experience.title: 10+ Years of Insight
experience.desc: Deep roots in the local supply chain allow us to distinguish between intermediaries and true manufacturers, ensuring you deal directly with the source.

verification.title: Rigorous Verification
verification.desc: We validate business licenses, production capacity, and ASME/ISO certifications manually. We replace 'claimed' quality with 'proven' reality.

connect.title: Global Connection
connect.desc: Building a bridge of trust. We go beyond translation to align engineering standards and business expectations, creating a reliable path for global trade.

transparency.title: Our Business Model
transparency.subtitle: 100% Free for Buyers
transparency.desc: We do not charge you any fees. You are free to access all our verified information and contact factories directly. We are happy simply to facilitate a win-win transaction. If you choose to let the factory know we helped, we receive a reasonable referral fee from them—but our primary goal is always your satisfaction.

advantages.title: Sourcing, Simplified & Secure.
advantages.description_1: Your privacy is our priority. Direct exposure results in unsolicited spam and gives vendors leverage. We protect your identity until you're ready to deal.
advantages.description_2: Time is your most valuable asset. Traditional vetting takes 4-6 weeks per supplier. We condense this into a single, efficient process, delivering a verified shortlist and competitive quotes in as little as 48 hours.

verification.title: The 4-Step Standard
verification.description: We don't just take their word for it. We verify everything.

scope.title: 1. Scope Verification
scope.description: We inspect the official Business License. If the scope says 'Wholesale' instead of 'Manufacturing', they are banned.

database.title: 2. Database Cross-Reference
database.description: We validate ASME 'U' Stamps and ISO certificates directly against the issuing body's official live database.

shipping.title: 3. Bill of Lading Analysis
shipping.description: We analyze shipping records to confirm the factory has a history of exporting to North America or Europe.

location.title: 4. Location Verification
location.description: We verify satellite imagery to ensure the address is a functioning production facility, not a sales office.
